abstract:
Using Google Cloud Machine Learning Engine to built a model that help in
estimating photovoltaic system design. An end-to-end python based deep
learning application.

*Tags:* Artificial Intelligence, Computer Vision, Deep Learning &
Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Science

Scheduled on `thursday 11:20 </schedule/#thu-11:20-lounge>`__ in room
lounge
description:
The used technologies are python based and include: MongoDB tensorflow
Flask google.cloud python API

A dataset of labelled satellite images is created. Several networks are
trained and tested on this dataset. The network is deployed on a
production server.

The results of the classification/segmentaion are used to feed python
based photovotlaic simulation libaries. The output is displayed and the
results (the potential) evaluated.
title: Satellite Image Segmentation Photovoltaic Potential Estimation
